| First                   = Punisher War Journal Vol 1 3 <!-- Organization has no actual appearance tags in the Database. -->

| History                 = The '''Santo Angelo Contras''' were a paramilitary organization formed in order to fight a communist uprising in the [[Central America|Central American]] country of [[Santo Angelo]], and led by [[José Accardo (Earth-616)|general Accardo]]. They were illegally funded through drug dealing with the [[Costa Family (Earth-616)|Costa mob]], arranged by [[San Lorenzo]] diplomat [[Hector Montoya (Earth-616)|Hector Montoya]] through [[Forrest Hunt (Earth-616)|Forrest Hunt]]. Their cause was eventually referred to, by Montoya, as having been "lost". These events indirectly led to [[Frank Castle (Earth-616)|Frank Castle]]'s family's murder, which turned Castle into the Punisher.{{r|Punisher War Journal Vol 1 3}}
 
| Equipment               = 
| Transportation          = 
| Weapons                 = Shoulder mounted anti-air rockets, other weapons supplied by [[Hector Montoya (Earth-616)|Montoya]].{{r|Punisher War Journal Vol 1 3}}
| Notes                   = 
| Trivia                  = * The concept of illegally supplying contras with weapons was inspired by the [[Iran-Contra Affair]], while the entire dealing seems to have been inspired by allegations of CIA drug dealings with organized crime elements in order to finance the Nicaraguan Contras.
